notes:
## New Features
- Practice Mode with save management and separate statistics
- Plugin browser with search and auto-update system
- OBS component snapping with visual guides
- Canvas lock/snap features
- Catalan, Galician, and Lolcat translations

## Improvements
- Config persistence across app updates (now stored in %APPDATA%)
- Persistent hotkey configuration
- Migration for multirun presets and stats files
- Improved OBS customization UI and window size
- Element order UI in Counter tab

## Bug Fixes
- Fix OBS canvas visibility issues
- Fix practice mode toggle and toast duration
- Fix customization iframe blink
- Fix badge overflow
- Fix Linux keyboard freeze and hotkey detection
